text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Alabama Educational TV Commission
807 Protective Life Building
Birmingham, Alabama
March 31, 1961
Mr. William G. Harley
President
N.A.E.B.
DuPont Circle Office Building
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
Attached uou will find a copy of the NAEB proposal for professional
working relationships following my use of scissors. You will note
that I have deleted any reference to the NETRC, which is for the
reason that I think we can only speak for ourselves in any official
statement. I have endeavored to make it a forthright professional
expression of a positive nature. I will appreciate your reaction to
this statement.
With kindest regards, I am
Sincerely yours.
Raymond D. Hurlbert
Director, Region II
RDH/ml
enc.
